original_title: Seduce Live at The Emerald Theater
overview: Detroit metal monsters Seduce perform live at the Emerald Theater in Mt. Clemens, Michigan - 2002.  Band members:  Mark Andrews - bass & lead vocals David Black - Guitar & backing vocals Chuck Burns - drums  Special Guest Appearance:  Darren McCarty  Set List:  Viper's Bite Love To Hate Out On The Streets I'm Strange The Slider (T-Rex cover) The Chopping Block Face To Face The Mirror (with guitar solo intro) Homicide Too Much Ain't Enough Auf Weidersehn (Cheap Trick cover) Ace of Spades (Motorhead cover) with Darren McCarty - vocals Colleen
title: Seduce Live at The Emerald Theater
